text.div:
This code system https://fhir.ehealth-systems.at/kiola/device provides a fragment that includes following code:

CodeDisplayDefinition
SDC Structured Data CaptureA device to manually enter vital data using a questionnaire.

name: KIOLADeviceCS
title: KIOLA Device Codes
description: Generic device types that can transmit vital data.

concept.definition: A device to manually enter vital data using a questionnaire.
